string-array.name: check_details
string-array.item:
- 2 liters of water per person per day for consumption. 
 - 1 liter of water per person per day for sanitation and food preparation.

Age | Intake
 Kids need: 5 to 8 -> 1 liter/day
 9 to 12 -> 1.5 liters/day
 13+ -> 2 liters/day.

- Water must be stored in plastic containers to avoid those that break or decompose.

"- Canned meats, fruits and vegetables
- Staples (salt, sugar, pepper, spices …)
 - Rice, beans, grains (corn, wheat…) and raw honey.
 - Food supplies should be non-perishable and shouldn't require refrigeration, cooking or much water.
 - Food items should be compact and lightweight."

- Bandages / Adhesive Bandages 
 - Sterile dressings and adhesive tapes
 - Antiseptic wipes / Disinfectant
 - Cold pack
 - OTC pain killers
 - Laxative / Anti-diarrhea
- Knife, scissors, tape, sterno, paper utencils, signal flare, storage containers, flashlight, power source (batteries, power bank, generator..), can opener, jumper cables…

- Toilet paper
 - Sanitizer, hand wipes
 - Liquid soap
 - Plastic bags
- Diapers, baby formula\n - Insulin / Prescription drugs…
- Board games / Card games
- Collars, leashes, id tags, pet food…
- Id cards, credentials, passports…
